Audio.Locality: 10 km S Pocone on Transpantaneira, Mato Grosso
Audio.Author: Daniel Lane
Audio.Comments: Response to playback (of B. culicivorus) from the same pair in semi-evergreen woodland. Part of a mixed-species flock.
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Glaucidium brasilianum,Synallaxis albilora,Campylorhynchus turdinus,Tolmomyias sulphurescens,Myiothlypis flaveola,Hylophilus pectoralis,Picumnus albosquamatus,Sittasomus griseicapillus
